column6: This is it! The Fall of The Hulks begins here. The opening round: THE RED HULK VS. THE THING with Reed Richards' life at stake. When the Baxter Building is attacked by the all-new, all-deadly Frightful Four, who will save the Fantastic Four? How about THE RED HULK?  Not  a chance.  The superstar team of JEPH LOEB and ED McGUINNESS shotgun this mindblowing chapter of the biggest Hulkventure of them all. Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Marko Djurdjevic | penciller:Ed McGuinness | inker:Mark Farmer | colorist:Dave Stewart
